title: Suggest changes to the lottery mechanism
body:
As we all know, the purpose of lottery is:
① The bonus pool is high and attracts users
② Increased destruction efforts

Because fewer and fewer people are buying lottery tickets now, the proposal proposes adjustments to the existing mechanism:

The bonus pool is changed from 1~ to two separate bonus pools. They are: a small lottery pool for 24 hours/draw once; a large lottery pool for 168 hours (7 days)/draw once, and other mechanisms are fine-tuned or unchanged.
author: 0x10EDE6a65471Bc907dB1f04150f1dbc924469276
